speaker: SCALES
text:
How
               
              now
              ?
               
              Is
               
              Jack
               
              Cade
               
              slain
              ?

speaker:
FIRST
               
              CITIZEN
text: No, my lord, nor likely to be slain; for

speaker:
FIRST
               
              CITIZEN
text: they have won the Bridge, killing all those that

speaker:
FIRST
               
              CITIZEN
text: withstand them. The Lord Mayor craves aid of

speaker:
FIRST
               
              CITIZEN
text: your Honor from the Tower to defend the city

speaker: SCALES
text:
Such
               
              aid
               
              as
               
              I
               
              can
               
              spare
               
              you
               
              shall
               
              command
              ;

speaker: SCALES
text:
But
               
              I
               
              am
               
              troubled
               
              here
               
              with
               
              them
               
              myself
              :

speaker: SCALES
text:
The
               
              rebels
               
              have
               
              essayed
               
              to
               
              win
               
              the
               
              Tower
              .

speaker: SCALES
text:
But
               
              get
               
              you
               
              to
               
              Smithfield
               
              and
               
              gather
               
              head
              ,

speaker: SCALES
text:
And
               
              thither
               
              I
               
              will
               
              send
               
              you
               
              Matthew
               
              Gough
              .

speaker: SCALES
text:
Fight
               
              for
               
              your
               
              king
              ,
               
              your
               
              country
              ,
               
              and
               
              your
               
              lives
              .

speaker: SCALES
text:
And
               
              so
               
              farewell
              ,
               
              for
               
              I
               
              must
               
              hence
               
              again
              .
